nodes.text: A sonic disruptor was a disruptor pistol used in the years following the Great Sith War.

One of the most violent sonic weapons on the market, the sonic disruptor was outlawed by the Galactic Republic, even for use against the Sith. The sonic disruptor disintegrated its target, leaving few traces of a victim behind. Personal defenses such as energy shields were no match for this weapon. Due to the massive energy requirements, the disruptor needed a few seconds of cool-down time between shots before firing again. Additionally, it had the advantage of dealing sonic damage, which a Jedi would not be able to deflect with his lightsaber.
This weapon was carried by bounty hunting brothers Dob and Del Moomo.

In the Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords video game, the sonic disruptor was a rifle. But in the more recent Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide, it is classified as a pistol.
